resources.string: Please enter a valid email address.
To ensure the security of your account, please enter your phone number below and we will send you a unique code to authenticate you.
Enter the six-digit verification code below. It may take up to a few minutes.
Click here to send another code
Looks like that code isn\'t valid. Please double-check the one we sent to you, or tap here to request a new one.
Resend your code if it doesn\'t arrive in <<WAIT_TIME>>
Code expired, too many attempts.\nPlease request a new code via SMS
Enter your birthdate below to verify your account.
A new code has been sent to your phone
Enter the code that was sent to your phone
Enter the code that was sent to
Enter the code that was sent to
Enter the code that was sent to your email address
Code expired, too many attempts.\nPlease request a new code via your email address
A new code has been sent to your email address
Looks like that code isn\'t valid. Please double-check the one we sent to you, or tap here to request a new one.
Resend your code if it doesn\'t arrive in <<WAIT_TIME>>
Enter the code that was sent to your email
Enter the 6-digit code we\'ve just sent to your email
A new code has been sent to your email
Select your country of tax residence.
Enable your card by entering the activation code that came attached with your physical card.
Your physical Apto Card has been enabled. We\'ve set a random PIN code for your card.
PIN is obtained via phone call and charge may be applied by your mobile network operator.
You must be 18 years or older.
Your information is private and secure.
These are the personal details you\'ve saved securely on your account. Tap below to confirm they\'re correct.

Having issues with your delivery address?
To make changes, go to the settings section in your account and update your information
We\'ll send your physical card to the address below:\n\n<<ADDRESS>>
Looks like you‚Äôve updated your personal details in your account.
Are you sure you do not want to agree to the Cardholder agreement?
The received workflow action is currently not supported.
Would you like to continue with an open application?
Spend your cryptocurrency held on your account across 44 million locations worldwide.
Spend your cryptocurrency held on your account across 44 million locations worldwide.
Unable to scan card if camera permissions are not granted!
Phone calls are disabled in this phone, please enable them before continuing.
Use your fingerprint for fast, secure access to your card.\nConfirm fingerprint to continue.
Already received your card? Activate it now!
Your physical Apto Card has been enabled. We\'ve set a random PIN code for your card.
PIN is obtained via phone call and charges may be applied by your mobile network operator.
Enable your card by entering the activation code that came attached with your physical card.
Tap to manage card or tap on the number to copy to clipboard
You have no transactions yet.\nStart now!
You\'ve not made any transactions yet.\nGet started now.
Want us to send you your debit card? Tap here.
Show account number, exp. date, and CVV
Close your card and request a replacement
Just as a heads up, once you confirm your card is lost or stolen, it\'ll instantly be locked so no one can use it.
Terms and Conditions of the Card
Retrieve your PIN via our automated system
You have no Funding sources linked with your card.
Call or email our support team
Freeze your card and order a replacement
Show all activity: declines, balance inquiries, etc.
Download transactions info into a PDF
Set passcode used in online transactions
You are activating your card. Are you sure?
You are suspending your card. Are you sure?
Your push and email notification preferences
Are you sure you want to log out?
Change the passcode used to unlock the app
To send an email, you have to configure your email app.
Handy notifications to help you see what you‚Äôre spending
Updates regarding privacy and cardholder agreements, etc.
Thank you for your application.\nWe are reviewing your information.\nWe will be in touch via email momentarily.
Thank you for your application.\nWe are reviewing your information.\nWe will be in touch via email momentarily.
Thank you for your application.\nWe are reviewing your information.\nWe will be in touch via email momentarily.
Your application has been approved.\nTap the Refresh button to continue to your card
Thank you for your application.\nWe are reviewing your information.\nWe will be in touch via email momentarily.
We‚Äôre currently undergoing system maintenance. Please check back later
There was an error while issuing your card
You don\'t have enough balance to issue the card. \n\nAdd your funds, then try again.
There was an error while issuing your card. Please try again.
Sending funds is disabled in your account. Please contact customer support
We can\'t charge the card issuance fee. Please contact customer support.
Your card will be disabled until you add a new funding source!
Your current funding source is not valid. Please select or add a different one!
Looks like you currently have no crypto wallet\nlinked with your card.
Received your physical Apto Card? Nice! Tap here to enable it.
Speak to our customer care team
Select a funding source\n\nJust as a heads up, your card is disabled until you tap on the card to select a new funding source
Telephony is disabled on this device. Please make sure your SIM is valid and cellular network is available.
Obtain the PIN code of your card
Set a new PIN code for your card
Show account number, exp.date, and CVV
Error: no SIM card is inserted
Close your card and request a replacement
Do you want to suspend your card?
Do you want to enable your card?
Just as a heads up, once you confirm your card is lost or stolen, it\'ll instantly be locked so no one can use it.
Please verify your fingerprint to proceed.
Add card to your Google Pay wallet
Cards are typically in transit now
Your card should be arriving soon
Your card should have arrived by now
Please contact support if you haven\'t received it.
This version of Android doesn\'t support Biometric Authentication.
Your device doesn\'t support Biometric Authentication.
Please enable the fingerprint permission in your device\'s Settings.
No fingerprint configured. Please register at least one fingerprint in your device\'s Settings.
Please enable lockscreen security in your device\'s Settings
You\'re on top of the waitlist!
Very soon you\'ll be able to spend your crypto anywhere, using your contactless card.
We\'ll be in touch the moment the card launches.
Choose a unique, four digit PIN code for your card.
Please re-enter your PIN code to confirm it.
Looks like your PIN didn\'t match. Please re-enter and try again.
You\'ve successfully created your PIN. Your physical card is now ready to use.

Some online transactions using your card require a secure passcode verification. This is different from your PIN used in physical card transactions. You can set your passcode here.

Before we set your passcode, we first need to verify you with a one time code.

Once your passcode is set, you can update it at any time.
Set a passcode for use in online transactions.
Please enable your card before setting the Passcode
Re-enter your passcode. \nYour passcode will be effective immediately.
Looks like your passcode didn\'t match. Please re-enter and try again.
For security reasons this file has expired, please request it again
Your file is being downloaded, check your downloads folder
Unable to save file without storage permission.
Choose a unique, four digit passcode for your App
Note - this Passcode is only used to manage your Card Settings within the app. If you sign out of this app completely, you will be required to log back in with your Phone Number and Date of Birth.
Please enter your passcode code to confirm it
Please enter the four digit Passcode you use to log into your Card App.
We will log you out of the app. To reset your passcode, please sign back in using your other credentials.
Your passcode has been changed successfully!
Please enter your first and last names
This birthdate is not authorized. A user must be 18 years or older to be verified and issued a card.
Please enter a valid card number
Are you sure you would like to delete this payment method?
We experienced an error while processing your transaction. Please try again or contact support for further assistance
This transaction will appear in your bank account statement as: <<VALUE>>
Learn more in the Cardholder Agreement
You can instantly transfer funds from your existing bank debit card to your <<VALUE>> card account. Please note that transfers are reviewed and they can be delayed or declined if we suspect risks.
This transaction will appear in your bank account statement as: <<VALUE>>
Instant deposit with a debit card
ACH transfer from an external account (2‚Äì3 days)
Login to your external account to submit a direct deposit account request or ACH bank transfer. You\'ll need the information below to complete the set up:

Please note at this time you can only use the direct deposit method to add funds to your account. No withdrawals are permitted except for verification purposes. This account is powered by Evolve Bank & Trust.

Please note at this time you can only use the direct deposit method to add funds to your account. No withdrawals are permitted except for verification purposes. This account is powered by Evolve Bank & Trust.
If you reject the agreement, then you will not be able to fund your card using ACH.
Enter the verification code we just sent you via SMS
The card will be sent to the address on file. Contact support if you need to make updates.
No, I don‚Äôt need a physical card
Please add sufficient funds to your active wallet to proceed.
Your card should arrive within 2 weeks.
Transfer money to another person\'s card
Search for available recipients by their phone number and then select the recipient to continue.
Search for available recipients by their email and then select the recipient to continue.
No results found. Please try a different search.
We experienced an error while processing your transaction. Please try again or contact support for further assistance.
